Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
For this faction's narrative style and in world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
In the lines below, {STR_LeaderName} is replaced by the name of the player's avatar.

In the lines below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.
Done a guild switch on us, eh? Alright, fine, we’ll gank you along with your Voidbringer masters. Spacers look after their own, {STR_LeaderName}! You’ll regret this.
Guild switch as in to change sides of allegiance
You’ve kept these scrubs in check on your own... you seem legit so far. Get your words out {STR_LeaderName}, we ain’t got all day. We’re headin’ out on a raid to the Voidbringers soon.
Scrub meaning to be useless and a waste of space. A raid as in to coordinate an attack
You’ve got a solid rep in this system. There’s a new boss ready to fight and we want an ally that’s not trash. Drop the beef with us, {STR_LeaderName}, and let’s go wreck them Voidbringers, yeah?
"Solid rep" meaning to have a reputation of good deeds. "Drop the beef with us" as in to forget previous conflicts and problems between parties
Alright scrub, joining them Voidbringer freaks was a big mistake. You wanna 2v1 us? Our Preacher’s gonna crush your skulls, {STR_LeaderName}! We ain’t had this much fun since Dreamscape was runnin’.
Scrub meaning to be useless and a waste of space. Preacher being the leader of the Spacer faction. Dreamscape is the virtual reality game that the Spacers previously used
You’ve gotta prove yourself before you’re one of us, {STR_LeaderName}. But we’ll roll with you for now, since we’ve got bigger problems with scum from another dimension.
Roll with as in to join forces and work together

Listen scrub, there’s these freaks from another plane of existence, Voidbringers, yeah? Hurry up and stop your whining with us, and we can 1V1 after all this mess is done if you still got beef with us.
"After all this mess is done if you still got beef with us" as in both parties can fight after the current problem if the player still has negative feelings towards the Spacers
Preacher said you were asking for a ganking, and you’ve proper proved yourself as trash this time. Fire up the engines, boys, we’re gonna raid {STR_LeaderName} and their Voidbringer mates.
"Asking for a ganking" as in to be behaving in such a bad way as to expect them to be attacked in retaliation. "Proper proved yourself as trash" as in shown themselves to be worthless
You’ve got a rep for blood spillin’ and skull bashin’. That’s legit, innit? We need your muscle in this fight, so get on with it and say your stuff {STR_LeaderName}.
"A rep for blood spillin'" as in to have a reputation for fighting
Those floating gits are doing a number on us, and they’ll gank you too, {STR_LeaderName}. Quit griefing us, get in with our crew and we’ll mess ‘em up good.
Gits being a negative term for annoying person. Gank as in harm or kill
